Description:
Research and identify new clients for supermarkets, pharmacies, gyms, coffeehouses, and diet centers.
Develop criteria for selecting and assessing venues
Achieve sales targets for our healthy snack products
Conduct periodic visits for retail stores to get new orders
Deliver and display products
Train client team on our product features
Prepare weekly sales reports and suggest sales methods to increase salesSkills
Skills:
Communication and Time Management skills
Negotiation skills
Computer skills (Excel, Word and PowerPoint)
English Language
2 -5 years of experience in a sales role within the food industry
Experience with lead management and territory planning

Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
Must own a car
